display_long_description:
***Includes cross-buy on Rift!**

Challenge your friends in a PvP VR Horror game 👻

Feel the thrill of a hunt in a 1v1 Duel or up to 1v3 Hide and Seek mode that will push your wits, perceptiveness, and courage to their very limits 😱 Employ a wide array of items, triggers, and skills tailored to your class to outsmart and defeat your adversary - a terrifying, lifeforce-draining Ghost or a dauntless, vigilant Hunter. All of this set in spine-chilling locations such as a haunted Mansion, Mines, or a horrid Orphanage.

Features:

• Meta Quest x PCVR Crossplay 

• Challenge your friends in a spooky horror PvP system with 1v1 and up to 1v3 modes [media]

• Two unique classes with dedicated skills and items [media]
• A suspenseful vibe of psychological horror [media]
• Haunted locations abound with possibilities and usable environment elements [media]
• Skins to customize your favorite character [media]
• Events and updates with new content to the game

Challenge your friends in a PvP VR Horror game 👻

Feel the thrill of a hunt in a 1v1 Duel or up to 1v3 Hide and Seek mode that will push your wits, perceptiveness, and courage to their very limits 😱 Employ a wide array of items, triggers, and skills tailored to your class to outsmart and defeat your adversary - a terrifying, lifeforce-draining Ghost or a dauntless, vigilant Hunter. All of this set in spine-chilling locations such as a haunted Mansion, Mines, or a horrid Orphanage.

Features:

• Meta Quest x PCVR Crossplay 

• Challenge your friends in a spooky horror PvP system with 1v1 and up to 1v3 modes ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39035354_3856821554549115_8285971767033229490_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=mRkD9PKfUQsQ7kNvwEEchvD&_nc_oc=Adl30zBTJIsQm6HP1quCkVHkb182c-n5aR-q7kc5IVlEvVAX7_pHDPqLYkGL8avEHXg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SKzTO3I4CcPqTmjipFRI4g&oh=00_AfOTAZz0McmLAJ9kXfDZTv4YroMH_Nb9FJUuUgvwkGrYhw&oe=685A75EF)

• Events and updates with new content to the game
